designStyle: Corporate, functional, data-centric, clean, and structured.

typography.fontFamily: System default sans-serif (likely a common Chinese font or a generic sans-serif)
typography.lineSpacing: Standard (implied 1.5x font-size for body text, tighter for headings)

spacing.gutterRules: Consistent horizontal and vertical spacing, often multiples of 8px or 10px.

layoutPrinciples.gridUsage: Columnar layout for main content areas, often 2-column or 3-column within sections.
layoutPrinciples.alignmentRules: Left-aligned text and labels, right-aligned values in tables. Form fields are typically left-aligned.
layoutPrinciples.breakpointBehavior: Implied responsive design for different screen sizes, with elements stacking or reflowing on smaller viewports (inferred from common enterprise application design).

visualHierarchy.fontSizes: Larger font sizes for main titles and section headings, smaller for body text and labels.
visualHierarchy.contrast: High contrast for text against backgrounds (dark text on light backgrounds).
visualHierarchy.emphasisMechanisms: Bold text for important labels or statuses, blue color for primary actions and links, red for warnings/rejections.

buttons.primary: Solid blue background, white text, rounded corners, subtle hover effect.
buttons.secondary: White background, blue border, blue text, rounded corners.
buttons.text-link: Blue text, no background or border.

components.cards: White background, subtle border, rounded corners, consistent internal padding.

inputs.text-fields: White background, light gray border, rounded corners, consistent height.
inputs.dropdowns: Similar to text fields with a chevron icon.

tables.rows: Alternating subtle background colors or clear row separation, consistent padding.

navigation.sidebar: Solid background (white), active item highlighted with a red vertical bar and bold text.
navigation.top-bar: Subtle border bottom, consistent padding, clear action buttons.

components.modal: White background, rounded corners, drop shadow, close icon in top right.

otherAttributes.corner-radius: Small to medium (e.g., 4px - 8px) on buttons, input fields, cards, and modals.
otherAttributes.shadowStyle: Subtle drop shadows, primarily used for modals or elevated components to indicate hierarchy.
otherAttributes.borderStyle: Thin, light gray borders for separation and definition of elements.
otherAttributes.interactionStates: Clear visual feedback for hover, active, and disabled states (e.g., color changes, opacity changes).
